content: And two, although the going is getting tougher for sure and although we may lose some of the upside and leeway that we had hoped to have; as we look ahead, however, we remain very confident that we will deliver organic operating cash flow growth of around 10% on average over the next 3 years as we said we would earlier this year. And that means that weâre confident weâre going to deliver that OCF growth 10% on average over the next 3 years and that, if you work through the math, will get you to the equity free cash flow of $800 million to $1 billion over 3 years on a commodity basis weâd set as a target.
